history.title: Company History
history.subtitle: Over 5 years of experience in marketplace packaging

content.p1: Our company started its journey in 2018 as a small packaging design studio. We quickly realized that the marketplace industry needed comprehensive solutions: from concept development to production and delivery of finished packaging. This understanding defined our further development.
content.p2: In 2020, we launched our own production facility, which allowed us to control quality at all stages and offer optimal prices to clients. During this time, we have implemented more than 1,000 projects for clients of various scales: from small brands to large retail chains.
content.p3: Today, we are a team of professionals uniting designers, technologists, and logistics specialists. Our experience allows us to create packaging solutions that not only protect the product and attract customers' attention but also fully comply with marketplace requirements.
